alert.note: Alert for Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin; Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 4:01PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Fremont County through 430 PM MDT... At 359 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northwest of Crowheart, which is also 17 miles southeast of Dubois, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 30 mph and penny sized hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crowheart and US Highway 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Brief heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm. Be prepared for reduced visibility and ponding of water on roadways.

area.areaDesc: Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin; Wind River Mountains East
